title: The Harbinger Experiment
itunes:title: The Harbinger Experiment
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Here's how it happened...

***

Credited to Zyon J ***

Presented by Pulp-Pourri Theatre (https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/pulp-pourri-theatre-audio-drama/id1122370231?mt=2)

***

Sound design by Zach Fortais-Gomm

***

Additional music: "Snowdrop", "Night of Chaos", "Long Note Two", "Ossuary 6 - Air", "Port Horizon", and "Ossuary 2 - Turn" by Kevin MacLeod

***

Narrated by Joe Stofko

***

Intro/Outro Music by Alex Aldea


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
